content: baby octopus this little octopus is perfect for little fingers to grasp and hold onto perfectly safe for small ones as there are no safety eyes to worry about he is worked in one piece from top of head to bottom there is no sewing other than closing the hole on the bottom and adding the sleepy eyes and mouth using the suggested hook and yarn this little guy will measure approx 10 overall in length without stretching the tentacles the body alone measures approximately 4 long and the tentacles alone measure approximately 5-6 long materials g/4mm hook yarn 100% cotton medium weight sewing needle abbreviations magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet increase increase work 2 stitches in one stitch decrease decrease work 2 stitches together chain - chain flo front loop only blo back loop only copyright december 2018 page 1 of 4 instructions r1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 06 r2 increase x6 12 r3 single_crochet increase x6 18 r4 increase sc2 x6 24 r5 sc3 increase x6 30 r6 single_crochet around 30 r7 sc2 increase sc2 x6 36 r8-11 single_crochet around 36 r12 sc5 decrease sc5 x3 33 r13 sc9 decrease x3 30 r14 sc4 decrease sc4 x3 27 r15 sc7 decrease x3 24 r16-17 single_crochet around 24 r18 sc3 decrease sc3 x3 21 r19 single_crochet around 21 r20 sc5 decrease x3 18 r21 sc7 decrease x2 16 r22 flo single_crochet ch50 starting in 2nd chain from hook increase single_crochet x8 8 tentacles stuff body firmly r23 blo of r21 sc2 decrease x4 12 r24 decrease x6 06 fasten_off using tail sew hole closed add sleepy eyes over r12 and mouth over r15 copyright december 2018 page 2 of 4 this pattern and all photos in this document are the property of carrey reynolds @ mixedkreations this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is allowed finished products created with this pattern may be sold it is appreciated if you give design credit to mixedkreations if you have any questions or need help don t hesitate to contact me ravelrypm-mixedkreations-www ravelry com/designers/carrey-rey-2 email-mixedkreations@gmail com instagram-www instagram com/mixed_kreations/ twitter-www twitter com/mixedkreationsd facebook-www facebook com/mixedkreationsdesigns/ etsy-www etsy com/shop/mixedkreations copyright december 2018 page 3 of 4 notes copyright december 2018 page 4 of 4
